speaker: Vinod Kurpad
title: The Latest Model Updates in Azure Form Recognizer
description:
Vinod Kurpad is back to talk about and demo the newest features from Azure Form Recognizer including document classification capability, updates to existing models like the new query fields based on OpenAI models and key normalization. 

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show
00:15 Welcome and Introductions
00:44 What is Form Recognizer

08:31 Demo begins
https;//aka.ms/FormRecognizer/GetStarted
09:04 Custom Classification
14:25 Query fields 
18:36 Pre-built models
22:35 Learn more
24:00 Wrap
